aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Simone Baravelli
aboutData.subtitle: MERN Stack Developer
aboutData.text: I am an experienced MERN stack developer with a strong understanding of MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. I excel at developing full-stack web applications using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Git. With my attention to detail and passion for collaboration, I consistently deliver high-quality software solutions that meet business requirements and enhance the user experience.

services.title: Web Development
services.text: I specialize in creating dynamic and user-friendly web applications using modern technologies like React, Next.js, ensuring seamless user experiences and robust functionality.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.text: I craft intuitive UI/UX for web and mobile apps, ensuring purposeful design elements that enhance user engagement from wireframes to prototypes.

services.title: SaaS Application Development
services.text: I specialize in crafting tailored SaaS solutions, whether for new projects or enhancements, focusing on scalable, secure, and efficient cloud-based software that fuels business growth.

services.title: eCommerce Development
services.text: I specialize in creating tailored, feature-rich eCommerce websites with secure payment gateways, ensuring a seamless shopping experience for your customers.

services.title: Backend Development
services.text: I design and develop scalable server-side solutions with Node.js and Express.js, integrating MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL for robust data security and peak performance.

services.title: Responsive Design
services.text: I specialize in crafting intuitive UI/UX for web and mobile apps. From wireframes to prototypes, I ensure every element enhances user engagement with purposeful design.

experience.title: Front End Developer
experience.subTitle: Atom Tech
experience.text: Experienced MERN stack developer adept at crafting responsive web applications, dedicated to continuous learning and delivering top-notch software solutions for Pendandweb and its clients through collaboration and innovation.

experience.title: React Js Developer
experience.subTitle: Jazani
experience.text: Experienced React JS developer proficient in crafting innovative web applications, dedicated to cross-functional teamwork, delivering scalable and maintainable code, and staying current with cutting-edge technologies and best practices.

experience.title: Java Developer
experience.subTitle: Daff Tecnologies
experience.text: Experienced Backend Java Developer proficient in building robust backend systems with MySQL integration, dedicated to designing scalable architectures, writing optimized queries, and ensuring data integrity. Skilled in developing maintainable and efficient code, collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams, and staying updated with the latest backend technologies and best practices.
